trans-unit.source: 1) Functions that use the underlying operating system facilities to perform name resolution, and that do not necessarily perform any network communication. This category contains only one function: dns.lookup(). Developers looking to perform name resolution in the same way that other applications on the same operating system behave should use dns.lookup().
trans-unit.target: 1）使用底层操作系统功能执行名称解析的功能，并且不一定执行任何网络通信。该类别仅包含一个函数： dns.lookup() 。希望以与同一操作系统上其他应用程序相同的方式执行名称解析的开发人员，应使用 dns.lookup() 。

trans-unit.source: 101 Upgrade statuses do not fire this event due to their break from the traditional HTTP request/response chain, such as web sockets, in-place TLS upgrades, or HTTP 2.0. To be notified of 101 Upgrade notices, listen for the 'upgrade' event instead.
trans-unit.target: 101升级状态由于脱离了传统的HTTP请求/响应链（例如Web套接字，就地TLS升级或HTTP 2.0）而不会触发此事件。要获得101升级通知的通知，请监听 'upgrade' 事件。

trans-unit.source: 128 bit AES is preferred over 192 and 256 bit AES in light of specific attacks affecting larger AES key sizes.
trans-unit.target: 考虑到影响较大AES密钥大小的特定攻击，与192和256位AES相比，首选128位AES 。

trans-unit.source: 2) Functions that connect to an actual DNS server to perform name resolution, and that always use the network to perform DNS queries. This category contains all functions in the dns module exceptdns.lookup(). These functions do not use the same set of configuration files used by dns.lookup() (e.g. /etc/hosts). These functions should be used by developers who do not want to use the underlying operating system's facilities for name resolution, and instead want to always perform DNS queries.
trans-unit.target: 2）连接到实际DNS服务器以执行名称解析，并始终使用网络执行DNS查询的功能。该类别包含 dns 模块中除 dns.lookup() 之外的所有功能。这些功能不使用 dns.lookup() 使用的同一组配置文件（例如 /etc/hosts ）。这些功能应由不想使用底层操作系统的功能进行名称解析，而希望始终执行DNS查询的开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Buffer.alloc(size[, fill[, encoding]]) returns a new initialized Buffer of the specified size. This method is slower than Buffer.allocUnsafe(size) but guarantees that newly created Buffer instances never contain old data that is potentially sensitive. A TypeError will be thrown if size is not a number.
trans-unit.target: Buffer.alloc(size[, fill[, encoding]]) 返回指定大小的新初始化的 Buffer 。此方法比 Buffer.allocUnsafe(size) 慢，但是可以保证新创建的 Buffer 实例绝不包含可能敏感的旧数据。一个 TypeError ，如果将被抛出 size 不是数字。

trans-unit.source: Buffer.allocUnsafe(size) and Buffer.allocUnsafeSlow(size) each return a new uninitialized Buffer of the specified size. Because the Buffer is uninitialized, the allocated segment of memory might contain old data that is potentially sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Buffer.allocUnsafe(size) 和 Buffer.allocUnsafeSlow(size) 均返回指定 size 的新未初始化 Buffer 。由于 Buffer 尚未初始化，因此分配的内存段可能包含潜在敏感的旧数据。

trans-unit.source: Buffer.from(array) returns a new Buffer that contains a copy of the provided octets.
trans-unit.target: Buffer.from(array) 返回一个新的 Buffer ，其中包含提供的八位字节的副本。

trans-unit.source: Buffer.from(arrayBuffer[, byteOffset[, length]]) returns a new Buffer that shares the same allocated memory as the given ArrayBuffer.
trans-unit.target: Buffer.from(arrayBuffer[, byteOffset[, length]]) 返回一个新的 Buffer ，它与给定的 ArrayBuffer 共享相同的分配内存。

trans-unit.source: Buffer.from(buffer) returns a new Buffer that contains a copy of the contents of the given Buffer.
trans-unit.target: Buffer.from(buffer) 返回一个新的 Buffer ，其中包含给定 Buffer 的内容的副本。

trans-unit.source: Buffer.from(string[, encoding]) returns a new Buffer that contains a copy of the provided string.
trans-unit.target: Buffer.from(string[, encoding]) 返回一个新的 Buffer ，其中包含提供的字符串的副本。

trans-unit.source: child_process.exec(): spawns a shell and runs a command within that shell, passing the stdout and stderr to a callback function when complete.
trans-unit.target: child_process.exec() ：生成一个shell并在该shell中运行命令，完成后将 stdout 和 stderr 传递给回调函数。

trans-unit.source: child_process.execFile(): similar to child_process.exec() except that it spawns the command directly without first spawning a shell by default.
trans-unit.target: child_process.execFile() ：类似于 child_process.exec() 不同之处在于它直接衍生为命令而无需首先通过默认产卵的壳。

trans-unit.source: child_process.execFileSync(): a synchronous version of child_process.execFile() that will block the Node.js event loop.
trans-unit.target: child_process.execFileSync() ：的同步版本 child_process.execFile() ，这将阻止Node.js的事件循环。

trans-unit.source: child_process.execSync(): a synchronous version of child_process.exec() that will block the Node.js event loop.
trans-unit.target: child_process.execSync() ：的同步版本 child_process.exec() ，这将阻止Node.js的事件循环。

trans-unit.source: child_process.fork(): spawns a new Node.js process and invokes a specified module with an IPC communication channel established that allows sending messages between parent and child.
trans-unit.target: child_process.fork() ：产生一个新的Node.js进程，并使用建立的IPC通信通道调用指定的模块，该通道允许在父级和子级之间发送消息。

trans-unit.source: dnsPromises.lookup() does not necessarily have anything to do with the DNS protocol. The implementation uses an operating system facility that can associate names with addresses, and vice versa. This implementation can have subtle but important consequences on the behavior of any Node.js program. Please take some time to consult the Implementation considerations section before using dnsPromises.lookup().
trans-unit.target: dnsPromises.lookup() 不一定与DNS协议有关。该实现使用操作系统工具，该工具可以将名称与地址相关联，反之亦然。这种实现会对任何Node.js程序的行为产生微妙但重要的后果。在使用 dnsPromises.lookup() 之前，请花一些时间来咨询“实现注意事项”部分。

trans-unit.source: napi_cancel_async_work can be used if the work needs to be cancelled before the work has started execution.
trans-unit.target: napi_cancel_async_work 如果需要在开始执行工作之前取消工作，则可以使用 napi_cancel_async_work。

trans-unit.source: napi_get_last_error_info returns the information for the last N-API call that was made.
trans-unit.target: napi_get_last_error_info 返回有关上一次进行的N-API调用的信息。

trans-unit.source: net.connect(), net.createConnection(), server.listen() and socket.connect() take a path parameter to identify IPC endpoints.
trans-unit.target: net.connect() ， net.createConnection() ， server.listen() 和 socket.connect() 采用 path 参数来标识IPC端点。

trans-unit.source: net.connect(path[, connectListener]) for IPC connections.
trans-unit.target: net.connect(path[, connectListener]) 用于 IPC连接。

trans-unit.source: net.connect(port[, host][, connectListener]) for TCP connections.
trans-unit.target: net.connect(port[, host][, connectListener]) 用于TCP连接。

trans-unit.source: net.createConnection(path[, connectListener]) for IPC connections.
trans-unit.target: net.createConnection(path[, connectListener]) 用于 IPC连接。

trans-unit.source: net.createConnection(port[, host][, connectListener]) for TCP connections.
trans-unit.target: net.createConnection(port[, host][, connectListener]) 用于TCP连接。

trans-unit.source: server.listen(path[, backlog][, callback]) for IPC servers
trans-unit.target: server.listen(path[, backlog][, callback]) 为 IPC服务器

trans-unit.source: server.listen([port[, host[, backlog]]][, callback]) for TCP servers
trans-unit.target: server.listen([port[, host[, backlog]]][, callback]) TCP服务器的 server.listen（[端口[，主机[，待办事项]]] [，回调]）

trans-unit.source: socket.connect(path[, connectListener]) for IPC connections.
trans-unit.target: socket.connect(path[, connectListener]) 用于 IPC连接的 socket.connect（path [，connectListener]）。

trans-unit.source: socket.connect(port[, host][, connectListener]) for TCP connections.
trans-unit.target: socket.connect(port[, host][, connectListener]) 用于TCP连接的 socket.connect（port [，host] [，connectListener]）。

trans-unit.source: Duplex - streams that are both Readable and Writable (for example, net.Socket).
trans-unit.target: Duplex -是两个流 Readable 和 Writable （例如， net.Socket ）。

trans-unit.source: Duplex and Transform streams are both Writable and Readable.
trans-unit.target: Duplex 和 Transform 流都是 Writable 和 Readable 。

trans-unit.source: Readable - streams from which data can be read (for example, fs.createReadStream()).
trans-unit.target: Readable -可以从中读取数据的流（例如 fs.createReadStream() ）。

trans-unit.source: Readable streams use the EventEmitter API for notifying application code when data is available to be read off the stream. That available data can be read from the stream in multiple ways.
trans-unit.target: Readable 当可以从流中读取数据时，可读流使用 EventEmitter API通知应用程序代码。可用数据可以多种方式从流中读取。

trans-unit.source: Transform - Duplex streams that can modify or transform the data as it is written and read (for example, zlib.createDeflate()).
trans-unit.target: Transform -可以在写入和读取数据时修改或转换数据的 Duplex 流（例如 zlib.createDeflate() ）。

trans-unit.source: Transform streams provide their own implementation of the writable._write().
trans-unit.target: Transform 流提供了自己的 writable._write() 实现。

trans-unit.source: Writable - streams to which data can be written (for example, fs.createWriteStream()).
trans-unit.target: Writable -可以向其写入数据的流（例如 fs.createWriteStream() ）。

trans-unit.source: Writable streams (such as res in the example) expose methods such as write() and end() that are used to write data onto the stream.
trans-unit.target: Writable 流（例如示例中的 res ）公开了用于将数据写入流的方法（例如 write() 和 end() )。

trans-unit.source: tls.createServer() sets the default value of the honorCipherOrder option to true, other APIs that create secure contexts leave it unset.
trans-unit.target: tls.createServer() 将 honorCipherOrder 选项的默认值设置为 true ，其他创建安全上下文的API会将其保持不变。

trans-unit.source: tls.createServer() uses a 128 bit truncated SHA1 hash value generated from process.argv as the default value of the sessionIdContext option, other APIs that create secure contexts have no default value.
trans-unit.target: tls.createServer() 使用从 process.argv 生成的128位截断的SHA1哈希值作为 sessionIdContext 选项的默认值，其他创建安全上下文的API没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: <string> The default value of the maxVersion option of tls.createSecureContext(). It can be assigned any of the supported TLS protocol versions, TLSv1.3, TLSv1.2', 'TLSv1.1', or 'TLSv1'. Default:'TLSv1.3', unless changed using CLI options. Using --tls-max-v1.2 sets the default to 'TLSv1.2'. Using --tls-max-v1.3 sets the default to 'TLSv1.3'. If multiple of the options are provided, the highest maximum is used.
trans-unit.target: <string> tls.createSecureContext() 的 maxVersion 选项的默认值。可以为其分配任何受支持的TLS协议版本， TLSv1.3 ， TLSv1.2' ， 'TLSv1.1' 或 'TLSv1' 。默认值： 'TLSv1.3' ，除非使用CLI选项进行了更改。使用 --tls-max-v1.2 'TLSv1.2 默认值设置为'TLSv1.2 '。使用 --tls-max-v1.3 'TLSv1.3' 默认值设置为'TLSv1.3'。如果提供了多个选项，则使用最高的最大值。

trans-unit.source: <string> The default value of the minVersion option of tls.createSecureContext(). It can be assigned any of the supported TLS protocol versions, 'TLSv1.3', TLSv1.2', 'TLSv1.1', or 'TLSv1'. Default:'TLSv1.2', unless changed using CLI options. Using --tls-min-v1.0 sets the default to 'TLSv1'. Using --tls-min-v1.1 sets the default to 'TLSv1.1'. Using --tls-min-v1.3 sets the default to 'TLSv1.3'. If multiple of the options are provided, the lowest minimum is used.
trans-unit.target: <string> tls.createSecureContext() 的 minVersion 选项的默认值。可以为其分配任何受支持的TLS协议版本： 'TLSv1.3' ，“ TLSv1.2' ， 'TLSv1.1' 或 'TLSv1' 。默认值： 'TLSv1.2' ，除非使用CLI选项进行了更改。使用 --tls-min-v1.0 会将默认值设置为 'TLSv1' 。使用 --tls-min-v1.1 'TLSv1.1' 默认值设置为'TLSv1.1'。使用 --tls-min-v1.3 'TLSv1.3' 默认值设置为'TLSv1.3'。如果提供了多个选项，使用最低的最小值。

trans-unit.source: libuv: The C library that implements the Node.js event loop, its worker threads and all of the asynchronous behaviors of the platform. It also serves as a cross-platform abstraction library, giving easy, POSIX-like access across all major operating systems to many common system tasks, such as interacting with the filesystem, sockets, timers, and system events. libuv also provides a pthreads-like threading abstraction that may be used to power more sophisticated asynchronous Addons that need to move beyond the standard event loop. Addon authors are encouraged to think about how to avoid blocking the event loop with I/O or other time-intensive tasks by off-loading work via libuv to non-blocking system operations, worker threads or a custom use of libuv's threads.
trans-unit.target: libuv：实现Node.js事件循环，其工作线程以及平台的所有异步行为的C库。它还充当跨平台的抽象库，使跨所有主要操作系统的POSIX类访问变得容易，并且可以访问许多常见的系统任务，例如与文件系统，套接字，计时器和系统事件进行交互。 libuv还提供了类似于pthreads的线程抽象，可用于驱动需要超越标准事件循环的更复杂的异步Addons。鼓励Addon作者考虑如何通过libuv将工作卸载到非阻塞系统操作，辅助线程或定制使用libuv线程中，从而避免因I / O或其他耗时的任务而阻塞事件循环。

trans-unit.source: Punycode is a character encoding scheme defined by RFC 3492 that is primarily intended for use in Internationalized Domain Names. Because host names in URLs are limited to ASCII characters only, Domain Names that contain non-ASCII characters must be converted into ASCII using the Punycode scheme. For instance, the Japanese character that translates into the English word, 'example' is '例'. The Internationalized Domain Name, '例.com' (equivalent to 'example.com') is represented by Punycode as the ASCII string 'xn--fsq.com'.
trans-unit.target: Punycode是RFC 3492定义的字符编码方案，主要用于国际化域名。由于URL中的主机名仅限于ASCII字符，因此必须使用Punycode方案将包含非ASCII字符的域名转换为ASCII。例如，日语字符翻译成英语单词 'example' 是 '例' 。国际化域名 '例.com' （相当于 'example.com' ）由Punycode表示为ASCII字符串 'xn--fsq.com' 。

trans-unit.source: >128Signal Exits - If Node.js receives a fatal signal such as SIGKILL or SIGHUP, then its exit code will be 128 plus the value of the signal code. This is a standard POSIX practice, since exit codes are defined to be 7-bit integers, and signal exits set the high-order bit, and then contain the value of the signal code. For example, signal SIGABRT has value 6, so the expected exit code will be 128 + 6, or 134.
trans-unit.target: >128 信号退出 -如果Node.js接收到致命信号（例如 SIGKILL 或 SIGHUP )，则其退出代码将为 128 加信号代码的值。这是标准的POSIX做法，因为出口代码定义为7位整数，并且信号出口将高位设置为1，然后包含信号代码的值。例如，信号 SIGABRT 的值为 6 ，因此预期的退出代码将为 128 + 6 或 134 。

trans-unit.target: <tab> -在空白行上按下时，显示全局和局部（作用域）变量。在输入其他输入时按下时，显示相关的自动完成选项。

trans-unit.target: ',' -应当打印调试信息的核心C ++模块的分隔列表。

trans-unit.target: 'LE' 小尾数的“ LE”。

trans-unit.source: 'SIGBREAK' is delivered on Windows when <Ctrl>+<Break> is pressed, on non-Windows platforms it can be listened on, but there is no way to send or generate it.
trans-unit.target: 'SIGBREAK' <Ctrl>+<Break> 时，在Windows上会传递“ SIGBREAK”，但在非Windows平台上，可以监听它，但是无法发送或生成它。

trans-unit.source: 'SIGBUS', 'SIGFPE', 'SIGSEGV' and 'SIGILL', when not raised artificially using kill(2), inherently leave the process in a state from which it is not safe to attempt to call JS listeners. Doing so might lead to the process hanging in an endless loop, since listeners attached using process.on() are called asynchronously and therefore unable to correct the underlying problem.
trans-unit.target: 'SIGBUS' 如果不使用 kill(2) 人为地提高'SIGBUS'， 'SIGFPE' ， 'SIGSEGV' 和 'SIGILL' ，则固有地使进程处于无法安全调用JS侦听器的状态。这样做可能导致进程陷入无限循环，因为使用 process.on() 附加的侦听器被异步调用，因此无法纠正根本问题。

trans-unit.source: 'SIGHUP' is generated on Windows when the console window is closed, and on other platforms under various similar conditions. See signal(7). It can have a listener installed, however Node.js will be unconditionally terminated by Windows about 10 seconds later. On non-Windows platforms, the default behavior of SIGHUP is to terminate Node.js, but once a listener has been installed its default behavior will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 'SIGHUP' 关闭控制台窗口时，会在Windows上以及在各种类似条件下的其他平台上生成“ SIGHUP”。参见 signal(7) 。它可以安装侦听器，但是大约10秒后Windows将无条件终止Node.js。在非Windows平台上， SIGHUP 的默认行为是终止Node.js，但是一旦安装了侦听器，它将删除其默认行为。

trans-unit.source: 'SIGINT' from the terminal is supported on all platforms, and can usually be generated with <Ctrl>+C (though this may be configurable). It is not generated when terminal raw mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 'SIGINT' 在所有平台上都支持终端机上的'SIGINT'，通常可以使用 <Ctrl>+C 生成（尽管这可以配置）。启用终端原始模式后，不会生成此消息。

trans-unit.source: 'SIGKILL' cannot have a listener installed, it will unconditionally terminate Node.js on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 'SIGKILL' 无法安装侦听器，它将无条件终止所有平台上的Node.js。

trans-unit.source: 'SIGPIPE' is ignored by default. It can have a listener installed.
trans-unit.target: 'SIGPIPE' 默认情况下，“ SIGPIPE”被忽略。它可以安装一个侦听器。

trans-unit.source: 'SIGSTOP' cannot have a listener installed.
trans-unit.target: 'SIGSTOP' 无法安装侦听器。

trans-unit.source: 'SIGTERM' and 'SIGINT' have default handlers on non-Windows platforms that reset the terminal mode before exiting with code 128 + signal number. If one of these signals has a listener installed, its default behavior will be removed (Node.js will no longer exit).
trans-unit.target: 'SIGTERM' 在非Windows平台上，'SIGTERM'和 'SIGINT' 具有默认处理程序，它们会在退出代码 128 + signal number 之前重置终端模式。如果这些信号之一安装了侦听器，则将删除其默认行为（Node.js将不再退出）。

trans-unit.source: 'SIGTERM' is not supported on Windows, it can be listened on.
trans-unit.target: 'SIGTERM' Windows不支持'SIGTERM'，可以监听它。

trans-unit.source: 'SIGUSR1' is reserved by Node.js to start the debugger. It's possible to install a listener but doing so might interfere with the debugger.
trans-unit.target: 'SIGUSR1' Node.js保留了“ SIGUSR1”以启动调试器。可以安装侦听器，但这样做可能会干扰调试器。

trans-unit.source: 'SIGWINCH' is delivered when the console has been resized. On Windows, this will only happen on write to the console when the cursor is being moved, or when a readable tty is used in raw mode.
trans-unit.target: 'SIGWINCH' 调整控制台大小后，将交付“ SIGWINCH”。在Windows上，只有在移动光标或在原始模式下使用可读的tty时，才会在写入控制台时发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: 'a' - Open file for appending. The file is created if it does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 'a' a'-用于追加的打开文件。如果文件不存在，则创建该文件。

trans-unit.source: 'a+' - Open file for reading and appending. The file is created if it does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 'a+' -打开文件以供读取和附加。如果文件不存在，则创建该文件。

trans-unit.target: 'error' 并显示错误消息 'Error: socket hang up' 和代码 'ECONNRESET'

trans-unit.source: 'errored': module.link() has been called, but at least one of its dependencies failed to link, either because the callback returned a Promise that is rejected, or because the Module the callback returned is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 'errored' ： module.link() 已被调用，但至少有一个依赖项无法链接，这是因为回调返回了被拒绝的 Promise ，或者因为回调返回的 Module 无效。

trans-unit.source: 'errored': The module has been evaluated, but an exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 'errored' ：该模块已被评估，但是引发了异常。

trans-unit.source: 'evaluated': The module has been successfully evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 'evaluated' ：模块已成功评估。

trans-unit.source: 'evaluating': The module is being evaluated through a module.evaluate() on itself or a parent module.
trans-unit.target: 'evaluating' ：正在通过自身或父模块上的 module.evaluate() 评估模块。

trans-unit.source: 'hex' - Encode each byte as two hexadecimal characters.
trans-unit.target: 'hex' hex'-将每个字节编码为两个十六进制字符。

trans-unit.source: 'ignore' - Instructs Node.js to ignore the fd in the child. While Node.js will always open fds 0 - 2 for the processes it spawns, setting the fd to 'ignore' will cause Node.js to open /dev/null and attach it to the child's fd.
trans-unit.target: 'ignore' -指示Node.js忽略子级中的fd。虽然Node.js始终会为其生成的进程打开fds 0-2，但将fd设置为 'ignore' 将导致Node.js打开 /dev/null 并将其附加到子代的fd上。

trans-unit.source: 'ignore' - equivalent to ['ignore', 'ignore', 'ignore']
trans-unit.target: 'ignore' -等效于 ['ignore', 'ignore', 'ignore']

trans-unit.source: 'inherit' - Pass through the corresponding stdio stream to/from the parent process. In the first three positions, this is equivalent to process.stdin, process.stdout, and process.stderr, respectively. In any other position, equivalent to 'ignore'.
trans-unit.target: 'inherit' -通过相应的stdio流往返于父进程。在前三个位置，这分别等效于 process.stdin ， process.stdout 和 process.stderr 。在任何其他位置，等效于 'ignore' 。

trans-unit.source: 'inherit' - equivalent to ['inherit', 'inherit', 'inherit'] or [0, 1, 2]
trans-unit.target: 'inherit' -等效于 ['inherit', 'inherit', 'inherit'] 或 [0, 1, 2]

trans-unit.source: 'instantiated': The module has been instantiated successfully, but module.evaluate() has not yet been called.
trans-unit.target: 'instantiated' ：模块已成功实例化，但是 module.evaluate() 尚未被调用。

trans-unit.source: 'instantiating': The module is currently being instantiated through a module.instantiate() call on itself or a parent module.
trans-unit.target: 'instantiating' ：当前正在通过自身或父模块上的 module.instantiate() 调用实例化该模块。

trans-unit.source: 'ipc' - Create an IPC channel for passing messages/file descriptors between parent and child. A ChildProcess may have at most one IPC stdio file descriptor. Setting this option enables the subprocess.send() method. If the child is a Node.js process, the presence of an IPC channel will enable process.send() and process.disconnect() methods, as well as 'disconnect' and 'message' events within the child.
trans-unit.target: 'ipc' -创建一个IPC通道，用于在父级和子级之间传递消息/文件描述符。一个 ChildProcess 最多可以具有一个IPC stdio文件描述符。设置此选项将启用 subprocess.send() 方法。如果子级是Node.js进程，则IPC通道的存在将启用 process.send() 和 process.disconnect() 方法，以及子级中的 'disconnect' 和 'message' 事件。

trans-unit.source: 'iso8859-13', 'iso885913'
trans-unit.target: 'iso8859-13' ， 'iso885913'

trans-unit.source: 'iso8859-14', 'iso885914'
trans-unit.target: 'iso8859-14' ， 'iso885914'

trans-unit.source: 'latin1' - A way of encoding the Buffer into a one-byte encoded string (as defined by the IANA in RFC 1345, page 63, to be the Latin-1 supplement block and C0/C1 control codes).
trans-unit.target: 'latin1' -一种将 Buffer 编码为一个字节编码的字符串的方式（由RFC 1345第63页中的IANA定义，将其作为Latin-1补充块和C0 / C1控制代码）。

trans-unit.source: 'linked': module.link() has been called, and all its dependencies have been successfully linked.
trans-unit.target: 'linked' ： module.link() 已被调用，并且其所有依赖项都已成功链接。

trans-unit.source: 'linking': module.link() has been called, but not all Promises returned by the linker function have been resolved yet.
trans-unit.target: 'linking' ： module.link() 已被调用，但链接器函数返回的所有Promises尚未解决。

trans-unit.source: 'pipe' - Create a pipe between the child process and the parent process. The parent end of the pipe is exposed to the parent as a property on the child_process object as subprocess.stdio[fd]. Pipes created for fds 0 - 2 are also available as subprocess.stdin, subprocess.stdout and subprocess.stderr, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 'pipe' -在子进程和父进程之间创建一个管道。管道的父端作为 child_process 对象上的属性，作为subprocess.stdio subprocess.stdio[fd] 暴露给父对象。为fds 0-2创建的管道也分别作为 subprocess.stdin ， subprocess.stdout 和 subprocess.stderr 可用。

trans-unit.source: 'pipe' - equivalent to ['pipe', 'pipe', 'pipe'] (the default)
trans-unit.target: 'pipe' -等效于 ['pipe', 'pipe', 'pipe'] （默认值）

trans-unit.source: 'r' - Open file for reading. An exception occurs if the file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 'r' -打开文件进行读取。如果文件不存在，则会发生异常。

trans-unit.source: 'r+' - Open file for reading and writing. An exception occurs if the file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 'r+' -打开文件进行读写。如果文件不存在，则会发生异常。

trans-unit.source: 'rs+' - Open file for reading and writing in synchronous mode. Instructs the operating system to bypass the local file system cache.
trans-unit.target: 'rs+' -打开文件以同步模式进行读写。指示操作系统绕过本地文件系统缓存。

trans-unit.source: 'ucs2' - Alias of 'utf16le'.
trans-unit.target: 'ucs2' -别名 'utf16le' 。

trans-unit.source: 'udp4' or 'udp6' (UDP v4 or v6)
trans-unit.target: 'udp4' 或 'udp6' （UDP v4或v6）

trans-unit.source: 'uncaughtException' is a crude mechanism for exception handling intended to be used only as a last resort. The event should not be used as an equivalent to On Error Resume Next. Unhandled exceptions inherently mean that an application is in an undefined state. Attempting to resume application code without properly recovering from the exception can cause additional unforeseen and unpredictable issues.
trans-unit.target: 'uncaughtException' 是异常处理的粗略机制，仅可作为不得已的手段使用。该事件不应等同于 On Error Resume Next 。未处理的异常本质上意味着应用程序处于未定义状态。尝试恢复应用程序代码而未正确从异常中恢复可能会导致其他无法预料和不可预测的问题。

trans-unit.source: --report-on-fatalerror Enables the report to be triggered on fatal errors (internal errors within the Node.js runtime, such as out of memory) that leads to termination of the application. Useful to inspect various diagnostic data elements such as heap, stack, event loop state, resource consumption etc. to reason about the fatal error.
trans-unit.target: --report-on-fatalerror 使报告能够在导致应用程序终止的致命错误（Node.js运行时内部错误，例如内存不足）时被触发。对检查各种诊断数据元素（例如堆，堆栈，事件循环状态，资源消耗等）以引起致命错误的原因很有用。

trans-unit.source: --report-on-signal Enables report to be generated upon receiving the specified (or predefined) signal to the running Node.js process. (See below on how to modify the signal that triggers the report.) Default signal is SIGUSR2. Useful when a report needs to be triggered from another program. Application monitors may leverage this feature to collect report at regular intervals and plot rich set of internal runtime data to their views.
trans-unit.target: --report-on-signal 使报告能够在接收到正在运行的Node.js进程的指定（或预定义）信号后生成。（有关如何修改触发报告的信号，请参见下文。）默认信号为 SIGUSR2 。需要从另一个程序触发报告时很有用。应用程序监视器可以利用此功能定期收集报告，并将丰富的内部运行时数据绘制到视图中。

trans-unit.source: --report-signal Sets or resets the signal for report generation (not supported on Windows). Default signal is SIGUSR2.
trans-unit.target: --report-signal 设置或重置用于生成报告的信号（Windows不支持）。默认信号为 SIGUSR2 。

trans-unit.source: --report-uncaught-exception Enables report to be generated on un-caught exceptions. Useful when inspecting JavaScript stack in conjunction with native stack and other runtime environment data.
trans-unit.target: --report-uncaught-exception 启用针对未捕获的异常生成报告。与本地堆栈和其他运行时环境数据一起检查JavaScript堆栈时很有用。

trans-unit.source: ALPNProtocols: <string[]> | <Buffer[]> | <TypedArray[]> | <DataView[]> | <Buffer> | <TypedArray> | <DataView> An array of strings, Buffers or TypedArrays or DataViews, or a single Buffer or TypedArray or DataView containing the supported ALPN protocols. Buffers should have the format [len][name][len][name]... e.g. '\x08http/1.1\x08http/1.0', where the len byte is the length of the next protocol name. Passing an array is usually much simpler, e.g. ['http/1.1', 'http/1.0']. Protocols earlier in the list have higher preference than those later.
trans-unit.target: ALPNProtocols ：<字符串[]> | <Buffer []> | <TypedArray []> | <Da​​taView []> | <缓冲区> | <TypedArray> | <Da​​taView>字符串数组， Buffer 或 TypedArray 或 DataView ，或者单个 Buffer 或 TypedArray 或 DataView 包含受支持的ALPN协议。 Buffer s的格式应为 [len][name][len][name]... 例如 '\x08http/1.1\x08http/1.0' ，其中 len byte是下一个协议名称的长度。传递数组通常要简单得多，例如 ['http/1.1', 'http/1.0'] 。列表中较早的协议比较晚的协议具有更高的优先级。

trans-unit.source: ALPNProtocols: <string[]> | <Buffer[]> | <TypedArray[]> | <DataView[]> | <Buffer> | <TypedArray> | <DataView> An array of strings, Buffers or TypedArrays or DataViews, or a single Buffer or TypedArray or DataView containing the supported ALPN protocols. Buffers should have the format [len][name][len][name]... e.g. 0x05hello0x05world, where the first byte is the length of the next protocol name. Passing an array is usually much simpler, e.g. ['hello', 'world']. (Protocols should be ordered by their priority.)
trans-unit.target: ALPNProtocols ：<字符串[]> | <Buffer []> | <TypedArray []> | <Da​​taView []> | <缓冲区> | <TypedArray> | <Da​​taView>字符串数组， Buffer 或 TypedArray 或 DataView ，或者单个 Buffer 或 TypedArray 或 DataView 包含受支持的ALPN协议。 Buffer s的格式应为 [len][name][len][name]... 例如 0x05hello0x05world ，其中第一个字节是下一个协议名称的长度。传递数组通常要简单得多，例如 ['hello', 'world'] 。（协议应按其优先级排序。）

trans-unit.source: Buffer instances are also Uint8Array instances. However, there are subtle incompatibilities with TypedArray. For example, while ArrayBuffer#slice() creates a copy of the slice, the implementation of Buffer#slice() creates a view over the existing Buffer without copying, making Buffer#slice() far more efficient.
trans-unit.target: Buffer 实例也是 Uint8Array 实例。但是，与 TypedArray 存在细微的不兼容。例如，虽然 ArrayBuffer#slice() 创建切片的副本，但 Buffer#slice() 的实现创建了现有 Buffer 的视图而不进行复制，从而使 Buffer#slice() 更加有效。

trans-unit.source: Buffer instances can be iterated over using for..of syntax:
trans-unit.target: Buffer 实例可以使用 for..of 语法进行迭代：

trans-unit.source: Buffer instances returned by Buffer.allocUnsafe()may be allocated off a shared internal memory pool if size is less than or equal to half Buffer.poolSize. Instances returned by Buffer.allocUnsafeSlow()never use the shared internal memory pool.
trans-unit.target: Buffer 如果 size 小于或等于 Buffer.poolSize 的一半，则可以从共享内部内存池中分配 Buffer.allocUnsafe() 返回的缓冲区实例。 Buffer.allocUnsafeSlow() 返回的实例从不使用共享内部内存池。

trans-unit.source: Content-Length is given in bytes not characters. The Buffer.byteLength() API may be used to determine the number of bytes in a given encoding. On outbound messages, Node.js does not check if Content-Length and the length of the body being transmitted are equal or not. However, when receiving messages, Node.js will automatically reject messages when the Content-Length does not match the actual payload size.
trans-unit.target: Content-Length 以字节为单位而不是字符。所述 Buffer.byteLength() API可以被用于确定在给定的编码的字节数。对于出站消息，Node.js不会检查Content-Length和要发送的正文长度是否相等。但是，当接收消息时，当 Content-Length 与实际有效负载大小不匹配时，Node.js将自动拒绝消息。

trans-unit.source: Content-Length is given in bytes not characters. The above example works because the string 'hello world' contains only single byte characters. If the body contains higher coded characters then Buffer.byteLength() should be used to determine the number of bytes in a given encoding. And Node.js does not check whether Content-Length and the length of the body which has been transmitted are equal or not.
trans-unit.target: Content-Length 以字节为单位而不是字符。上面的示例有效，因为字符串 'hello world' 仅包含单字节字符。如果正文包含更高的编码字符，则应使用 Buffer.byteLength() 确定给定编码中的字节数。Node.js不会检查 Content-Length 和已发送的正文长度是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Domain.dispose() has been removed. Recover from failed I/O actions explicitly via error event handlers set on the domain instead.
trans-unit.target: Domain.dispose() 已被删除。而是通过在域上设置的错误事件处理程序来明确地从失败的I / O操作中恢复。

trans-unit.source: Domain is a child class of EventEmitter. To handle the errors that it catches, listen to its 'error' event.
trans-unit.target: Domain 是 EventEmitter 的子类。要处理它捕获的错误，请侦听其 'error' 事件。

trans-unit.source: EACCES (Permission denied): An attempt was made to access a file in a way forbidden by its file access permissions.
trans-unit.target: EACCES （权限被拒绝）：尝试以文件访问权限所禁止的方式访问文件。

trans-unit.source: EADDRINUSE (Address already in use): An attempt to bind a server (net, http, or https) to a local address failed due to another server on the local system already occupying that address.
trans-unit.target: EADDRINUSE （地址已在使用中）：尝试将服务器（ net ， http 或 https ）绑定到本地地址失败，因为本地系统上的另一台服务器已经占用了该地址。

trans-unit.source: ECONNREFUSED (Connection refused): No connection could be made because the target machine actively refused it. This usually results from trying to connect to a service that is inactive on the foreign host.
trans-unit.target: ECONNREFUSED （连接被拒绝）：由于目标计算机主动拒绝连接，因此无法建立连接。这通常是由于尝试连接到外部主机上处于非活动状态的服务而导致的。

trans-unit.source: ECONNRESET (Connection reset by peer): A connection was forcibly closed by a peer. This normally results from a loss of the connection on the remote socket due to a timeout or reboot. Commonly encountered via the http and net modules.
trans-unit.target: ECONNRESET （对等方重置连接）：对等方强制关闭了连接。这通常是由于超时或重新启动导致远程套接字上的连接丢失而导致的。通常通过 http 和 net 模块遇到。

trans-unit.source: EEXIST (File exists): An existing file was the target of an operation that required that the target not exist.
trans-unit.target: EEXIST （文件存在）：现有文件是要求该目标不存在的操作的目标。

trans-unit.source: EISDIR (Is a directory): An operation expected a file, but the given pathname was a directory.
trans-unit.target: EISDIR （是目录）：一个操作需要一个文件，但是给定的路径名​​是一个目录。

trans-unit.source: EMFILE (Too many open files in system): Maximum number of file descriptors allowable on the system has been reached, and requests for another descriptor cannot be fulfilled until at least one has been closed. This is encountered when opening many files at once in parallel, especially on systems (in particular, macOS) where there is a low file descriptor limit for processes. To remedy a low limit, run ulimit -n 2048 in the same shell that will run the Node.js process.
trans-unit.target: EMFILE （系统中打开的文件过多）：已达到系统上允许的最大文件描述符数量，并且在关闭至少一个描述符之前，无法满足对另一个描述符的请求。一次并行打开许多文件时会遇到这种情况，尤其是在进程的文件描述符限制较低的系统（尤其是macOS）上。要补救下限，请在将运行Node.js进程的同一外壳中运行 ulimit -n 2048 。

trans-unit.source: ENOENT (No such file or directory): Commonly raised by fs operations to indicate that a component of the specified pathname does not exist — no entity (file or directory) could be found by the given path.
trans-unit.target: ENOENT （无此类文件或目录）： fs 操作通常引发该状态，以指示指定路径名的组件不存在-给定路径找不到任何实体（文件或目录）。

trans-unit.source: ENOTDIR (Not a directory): A component of the given pathname existed, but was not a directory as expected. Commonly raised by fs.readdir.
trans-unit.target: ENOTDIR （非目录）：存在给定路径名的组件，但不是预期的目录。通常由 fs.readdir 引发。

trans-unit.source: ENOTEMPTY (Directory not empty): A directory with entries was the target of an operation that requires an empty directory — usually fs.unlink.
trans-unit.target: ENOTEMPTY （目录不为空）：具有条目的目录是需要空目录的操作的目标，通常是 fs.unlink 。

trans-unit.source: ENOTFOUND (DNS lookup failed): Indicates a DNS failure of either EAI_NODATA or EAI_NONAME. This is not a standard POSIX error.
trans-unit.target: ENOTFOUND （DNS查找失败）：指示DNS失败，即 EAI_NODATA 或 EAI_NONAME 。这不是标准的POSIX错误。

trans-unit.source: EPERM (Operation not permitted): An attempt was made to perform an operation that requires elevated privileges.
trans-unit.target: EPERM （不允许操作）：试图执行需要提升特权的操作。

trans-unit.source: EPIPE (Broken pipe): A write on a pipe, socket, or FIFO for which there is no process to read the data. Commonly encountered at the net and http layers, indicative that the remote side of the stream being written to has been closed.
trans-unit.target: EPIPE （折断的管道）：在管道，套接字或FIFO上的写操作，没有进程可以读取数据。在 net 和 http 层上经常遇到，表示正在写入的流的远程端已关闭。

trans-unit.source: ETIMEDOUT (Operation timed out): A connect or send request failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time. Usually encountered by http or net — often a sign that a socket.end() was not properly called.
trans-unit.target: ETIMEDOUT （操作超时）：连接或发送请求失败，因为一段时间后被连接方未正确响应。通常由 http 或 net 遇到-通常表示未正确调用 socket.end() 的迹象。

trans-unit.source: Http1IncomingMessage<http.IncomingMessage> Specifies the IncomingMessage class to used for HTTP/1 fallback. Useful for extending the original http.IncomingMessage. Default:http.IncomingMessage.
trans-unit.target: Http1IncomingMessage <http.IncomingMessage>指定用于HTTP / 1后备的 IncomingMessage 类。对于扩展原始 http.IncomingMessage 有用。默认值： http.IncomingMessage 。

trans-unit.source: Http1ServerResponse<http.ServerResponse> Specifies the ServerResponse class to used for HTTP/1 fallback. Useful for extending the original http.ServerResponse. Default:http.ServerResponse.
trans-unit.target: Http1ServerResponse <http.ServerResponse>指定用于HTTP / 1后备的 ServerResponse 类。对于扩展原始 http.ServerResponse 很有用。默认值： http.ServerResponse 。

trans-unit.source: Http2ServerRequest<http2.Http2ServerRequest> Specifies the Http2ServerRequest class to use. Useful for extending the original Http2ServerRequest. Default:Http2ServerRequest.
trans-unit.target: Http2ServerRequest <http2.Http2ServerRequest>指定要使用的 Http2ServerRequest 类。对于扩展原始 Http2ServerRequest 很有用。默认值： Http2ServerRequest 。

trans-unit.source: Http2ServerResponse<http2.Http2ServerResponse> Specifies the Http2ServerResponse class to use. Useful for extending the original Http2ServerResponse. Default:Http2ServerResponse.
trans-unit.target: Http2ServerResponse <http2.Http2ServerResponse>指定要使用的 Http2ServerResponse 类。对于扩展原始 Http2ServerResponse 很有用。默认值： Http2ServerResponse 。

trans-unit.source: IncomingMessage<http.IncomingMessage> Specifies the IncomingMessage class to be used. Useful for extending the original IncomingMessage. Default:IncomingMessage.
trans-unit.target: IncomingMessage <http.IncomingMessage>指定要使用的 IncomingMessage 类。对于扩展原始 IncomingMessage 有用。默认值： IncomingMessage 。

trans-unit.source: Intl.v8BreakIterator was a non-standard extension and has been removed. See Intl.Segmenter.
trans-unit.target: Intl.v8BreakIterator 是非标准扩展，已被删除。请参阅 Intl.Segmenter 。

trans-unit.source: Local<Object> exports,
trans-unit.target: Local<Object> exports ，

trans-unit.source: Local<Value> module, and
trans-unit.target: Local<Value> module ，以及

trans-unit.source: Module._debug() is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: Module._debug() 不推荐使用Module._debug（）。

trans-unit.source: N<number> Alias for cost. Only one of both may be specified.
trans-unit.target: N <编号>别名 cost 。只能指定两者之一。

trans-unit.source: NODE_PATH is not part of resolving import specifiers. Please use symlinks if this behavior is desired.
trans-unit.target: NODE_PATH 不是解析 import 说明符的一部分。如果需要此行为，请使用符号链接。

trans-unit.source: NODE_PATH is still supported, but is less necessary now that the Node.js ecosystem has settled on a convention for locating dependent modules. Sometimes deployments that rely on NODE_PATH show surprising behavior when people are unaware that NODE_PATH must be set. Sometimes a module's dependencies change, causing a different version (or even a different module) to be loaded as the NODE_PATH is searched.
trans-unit.target: NODE_PATH 仍然支持NODE_PATH，但是由于Node.js生态系统已经确定了用于定位依赖模块的约定，因此NODE_PATH不再需要。当人们不知道必须设置 NODE_PATH 时，有时依赖 NODE_PATH 的部署会表现出令人惊讶的行为。有时，模块的依赖关系会发生变化，导致在搜索 NODE_PATH 时加载不同的版本（甚至是不同的模块）。

trans-unit.source: NODE_PATH was originally created to support loading modules from varying paths before the current module resolution algorithm was defined.
trans-unit.target: NODE_PATH 最初创建NODE_PATH是为了支持在定义当前模块解析算法之前从不同路径加载模块。

trans-unit.source: NODE_REPL_HISTORY - When a valid path is given, persistent REPL history will be saved to the specified file rather than .node_repl_history in the user's home directory. Setting this value to '' (an empty string) will disable persistent REPL history. Whitespace will be trimmed from the value. On Windows platforms environment variables with empty values are invalid so set this variable to one or more spaces to disable persistent REPL history.
trans-unit.target: NODE_REPL_HISTORY -提供有效路径后，永久性REPL历史记录将保存到指定文件，而不是用户主目录中的 .node_repl_history 。将此值设置为 '' （空字符串）将禁用持久性REPL历史记录。空格将从值中修剪掉。在Windows平台上，具有空值的环境变量无效，因此请将此变量设置为一个或多个空格以禁用持久性REPL历史记录。

trans-unit.source: NODE_REPL_HISTORY_SIZE - Controls how many lines of history will be persisted if history is available. Must be a positive number. Default:1000.
trans-unit.target: NODE_REPL_HISTORY_SIZE -如果有历史记录，则控制将保留多少行历史记录。必须为正数。默认值： 1000 。

trans-unit.source: NODE_REPL_MODE - May be either 'sloppy' or 'strict'. Default:'sloppy', which will allow non-strict mode code to be run.
trans-unit.target: NODE_REPL_MODE -可以是 'sloppy' 或 'strict' 。默认值： 'sloppy' ，它将允许运行非严格模式的代码。

trans-unit.source: NODE_V8_COVERAGE will automatically propagate to subprocesses, making it easier to instrument applications that call the child_process.spawn() family of functions. NODE_V8_COVERAGE can be set to an empty string, to prevent propagation.
trans-unit.target: NODE_V8_COVERAGE 将自动传播到子进程，从而使检测调用 child_process.spawn() 系列函数的应用程序更加容易。可以将 NODE_V8_COVERAGE 设置为空字符串，以防止传播。

trans-unit.source: NaN, Infinity, and -Infinity are no longer valid time specifiers.
trans-unit.target: NaN ， Infinity 和 -Infinity 不再是有效的时间指定符。

trans-unit.source: Number values outside the range of Number.MIN_SAFE_INTEGER -(2^53 - 1) - Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER (2^53 - 1) will lose precision.
trans-unit.target: Number Number.MIN_SAFE_INTEGER -（2 ^ Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER ）-Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER（2 ^ 53-1）范围之外的数字值将失去精度。

trans-unit.source: Object properties are compared unordered.
trans-unit.target: Object 属性无序比较。

trans-unit.source: PerformanceObserver objects provide notifications when new PerformanceEntry instances have been added to the Performance Timeline.
trans-unit.target: PerformanceObserver 当新的 PerformanceEntry 实例已添加到性能时间表时，PerformanceObserver对象会提供通知。

trans-unit.source: REPLServer.parseREPLKeyword() was removed from userland visibility.
trans-unit.target: REPLServer.parseREPLKeyword() 已从用户界面可见性中删除。

trans-unit.source: REPLServer.prototype.memory() is only necessary for the internal mechanics of the REPLServer itself. Do not use this function.
trans-unit.target: REPLServer.prototype.memory() 仅对于 REPLServer 本身的内部机制是必需的。不要使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: REPLServer.turnOffEditorMode() was removed from userland visibility.
trans-unit.target: REPLServer.turnOffEditorMode() 已从用户界面可见性中删除。

trans-unit.source: RSA_PKCS1_PSS_PADDING will use MGF1 with the same hash function used to sign the message as specified in section 3.1 of RFC 4055, unless an MGF1 hash function has been specified as part of the key in compliance with section 3.3 of RFC 4055.
trans-unit.target: RSA_PKCS1_PSS_PADDING 将使用具有与RFC 4055第3.1节中指定的消息签名相同的哈希函数的MGF1，除非已将MGF1哈希函数指定为符合RFC 4055第3.3节的密钥的一部分。

trans-unit.source: RSA_PKCS1_PSS_PADDING will use MGF1 with the same hash function used to sign the message as specified in section 3.1 of RFC 4055.
trans-unit.target: RSA_PKCS1_PSS_PADDING 将使用MGF1，其哈希函数与RFC 4055第3.1节中指定的用于签名消息的哈希函数相同。

trans-unit.source: RSA_PKCS1_PSS_PADDING will use MGF1 with the same hash function used to verify the message as specified in section 3.1 of RFC 4055, unless an MGF1 hash function has been specified as part of the key in compliance with section 3.3 of RFC 4055.
trans-unit.target: RSA_PKCS1_PSS_PADDING 将使用具有与用于验证RFC 4055第3.1节中指定的消息相同的哈希函数的MGF1，除非已将MGF1哈希函数指定为符合RFC 4055第3.3节的密钥的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Readable streams effectively operate in one of two modes: flowing and paused. These modes are separate from object mode. A Readable stream can be in object mode or not, regardless of whether it is in flowing mode or paused mode.
trans-unit.target: Readable 流有效地以两种模式之一运行：流动和暂停。这些模式与对象模式分开。甲 Readable 流可以是在对象模式与否，无论其是否是在流动模式或暂停模式。

trans-unit.source: RegExp Unicode Property Escapes
trans-unit.target: RegExp Unicode属性转义

trans-unit.source: SCHED_RR is the default on all operating systems except Windows. Windows will change to SCHED_RR once libuv is able to effectively distribute IOCP handles without incurring a large performance hit.
trans-unit.target: SCHED_RR 是Windows以外所有操作系统上的默认设置。Windows将变更为 SCHED_RR 一次libuv能够有效地分配IOCP句柄，而不会产生大的性能损失。

trans-unit.target: SIGUSR1SIGUSR2

trans-unit.source: SNICallback(servername, cb)<Function> A function that will be called if the client supports SNI TLS extension. Two arguments will be passed when called: servername and cb. SNICallback should invoke cb(null, ctx), where ctx is a SecureContext instance. (tls.createSecureContext(...) can be used to get a proper SecureContext.) If SNICallback wasn't provided the default callback with high-level API will be used (see below).
trans-unit.target: SNICallback(servername, cb) <函数>如果客户端支持SNI TLS扩展，则将调用该函数。调用时将传递两个参数： servername 和 cb 。 SNICallback 应该调用 cb(null, ctx) ，其中 ctx 是 SecureContext 实例。（可以使用 tls.createSecureContext(...) 获取正确的 SecureContext 。）如果未提供 SNICallback ,则将使用具有高级API的默认回调（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: SNICallback: See tls.createServer()
trans-unit.target: SNICallback ：请参阅 tls.createServer()

trans-unit.target: ServerResponse <http.ServerResponse>指定要使用的 ServerResponse 类。对于扩展原始 ServerResponse 很有用。默认值： ServerResponse 。

trans-unit.source: [in/out] word_count: Must be initialized to the length of the words array. Upon return, it will be set to the actual number of words that would be needed to store this BigInt.
trans-unit.target: [in/out] word_count ：必须初始化为 words 数组的长度。返回时，它将设置为存储此 BigInt 所需的实际单词数。

trans-unit.source: [in] argc: The count of elements in the argv array.
trans-unit.target: [in] argc ： argv 数组中元素的计数。

trans-unit.target: [in] async_context ：正在调用回调的异步操作的上下文。通常，这应该是先前从 napi_async_init 获得的值。但是，也允许使用 NULL ，这表示当前异步上下文（如果有）将用于回调。

trans-unit.source: [in] async_context: The async context to be destroyed.

trans-unit.target: [in] async_resource ：与异步工作关联的可选对象，该对象将传递给可能的 async_hooks init hooks。

trans-unit.target: [in] buf ：将UTF16-LE编码的字符串写入其中的缓冲区。如果传入NULL，则返回字符串的长度（以2字节代码为单位）。

trans-unit.source: [in] call_js_cb: Optional callback which calls the JavaScript function in response to a call on a different thread. This callback will be called on the main thread. If not given, the JavaScript function will be called with no parameters and with undefined as its this value.
trans-unit.target: [in] call_js_cb ：可选回调，该JavaScript调用JavaScript函数以响应不同线程上的调用。该回调将在主线程上调用。如果不给，JavaScript函数将不带参数调用，并与 undefined 为 this 值。

trans-unit.source: [in] cb: The native function which should be called when this function object is invoked.
trans-unit.target: [in] cb ：调用此函数对象时应调用的本机函数。

trans-unit.source: [in] cbinfo: The callback info passed into the callback function.
trans-unit.target: [in] cbinfo ：传递给回调函数的回调信息。

trans-unit.source: [in] change_in_bytes: The change in externally allocated memory that is kept alive by JavaScript objects.
trans-unit.target: [in] change_in_bytes ：由JavaScript对象保持活动状态的外部分配内存中的更改。

trans-unit.source: [in] code: Optional napi_value with the string for the error code to be associated with the error.
trans-unit.target: [in] code ：可选的 napi_value ,带有与错误相关联的错误代码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: [in] code: Optional error code to be set on the error.
trans-unit.target: [in] code ：要在错误上设置的可选错误代码。

trans-unit.source: [in] complete: The native function which will be called when the asynchronous logic is completed or is cancelled. The given function is called from the main event loop thread.
trans-unit.target: [in] complete ：当异步逻辑完成或被取消时将调用的本机函数。给定的函数从主事件循环线程中调用。

trans-unit.source: [in] cons: napi_value representing the JavaScript function to be invoked as a constructor.
trans-unit.target: [in] cons ： napi_value 表示要作为构造函数调用的JavaScript函数。

trans-unit.source: [in] constructor: Callback function that handles constructing instances of the class. (This should be a static method on the class, not an actual C++ constructor function.)
trans-unit.target: [in] constructor ：回调函数，用于处理类的实例。（这应该是类上的静态方法，而不是实际的C ++构造函数。）

trans-unit.source: [in] constructor: The JavaScript function object of the constructor function to check against.
trans-unit.target: [in] constructor ：要检查的构造函数的JavaScript函数对象。

trans-unit.source: [in] context: Context for the async operation that is invoking the callback. This should be a value previously obtained from napi_async_init.
trans-unit.target: [in] context ：调用回调的异步操作的上下文。这应该是先前从 napi_async_init 获得的值。

trans-unit.source: [in] context: Optional data to attach to the resulting napi_threadsafe_function.
trans-unit.target: [in] context ：附加到生成的 napi_threadsafe_function 的可选数据。

trans-unit.source: [in] context: The optional data with which the thread-safe function was created.
trans-unit.target: [in] context ：用于创建线程安全功能的可选数据。

trans-unit.source: [in] data: Data created by the secondary thread. It is the responsibility of the callback to convert this native data to JavaScript values (with N-API functions) that can be passed as parameters when js_callback is invoked. This pointer is managed entirely by the threads and this callback. Thus this callback should free the data.
trans-unit.target: [in] data ：由辅助线程创建的数据。回调负责将此原始数据转换为JavaScript值（使用N-API函数），这些值可以在调用 js_callback 时作为参数传递。该指针完全由线程和此回调管理。因此，此回调应释放数据。

trans-unit.source: [in] data: Data to send into JavaScript via the callback call_js_cb provided during the creation of the thread-safe JavaScript function.
trans-unit.target: [in] data ：通过在线程安全的JavaScript函数创建期间提供的回调 call_js_cb 发送到JavaScript的数据。

trans-unit.source: [in] data: Optional data to be passed to the constructor callback as the data property of the callback info.
trans-unit.target: [in] data ：作为回调信息的 data 属性传递给构造函数回调的可选数据。

trans-unit.source: [in] data: Raw pointer to the external data.
trans-unit.target: [in] data ：指向外部数据的原始指针。

trans-unit.source: [in] data: Raw pointer to the underlying buffer to copy from.
trans-unit.target: [in] data ：指向要从其复制的基础缓冲区的原始指针。

trans-unit.source: [in] data: The data item to make available to bindings of this instance.
trans-unit.target: [in] data ：可用于此实例的绑定的数据项。

trans-unit.source: [in] data: User-provided data context. This will be passed back into the execute and complete functions.
trans-unit.target: [in] data ：用户提供的数据上下文。这将被传递回执行和完成功能。

trans-unit.source: [in] data: User-provided data context. This will be passed back into the function when invoked later.
trans-unit.target: [in] data ：用户提供的数据上下文。稍后调用时，它将被传递回函数中。

trans-unit.source: [in] dataview: napi_value representing the DataView whose properties to query.
trans-unit.target: [in] dataview napi_value ：napi_value表示要查询其属性的 DataView 。

trans-unit.source: [in] deferred: The deferred object whose associated promise to resolve.
trans-unit.target: [in] deferred ：要解析其相关诺言的延迟对象。

trans-unit.source: [in] description: Optional napi_value which refers to a JavaScript String to be set as the description for the symbol.
trans-unit.target: [in] description ：可选的 napi_value ，它指向要设置为符号描述的JavaScript String 。

trans-unit.source: [in] env: The environment that the API is invoked under
trans-unit.target: [in] env ：在其下调用API的环境

trans-unit.source: [in] env: The environment that the API is invoked under.
trans-unit.target: [in] env ：在其下调用API的环境。

trans-unit.source: [in] env: The environment that the N-API call is invoked under.
trans-unit.target: [in] env ：在其下调用N-API的环境。

trans-unit.source: [in] env: The environment to use for API calls, or NULL if the thread-safe function is being torn down and data may need to be freed.
trans-unit.target: [in] env ：用于API调用的环境，如果线程安全功能被拆除并且可能需要释放 data 则为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: [in] err: The error that is passed to 'uncaughtException'.
trans-unit.target: [in] err ：传递给 'uncaughtException' 的错误。

trans-unit.source: [in] error: The JavaScript value to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: [in] error ：要抛出的JavaScript值。

trans-unit.source: [in] escapee: napi_value representing the JavaScript Object to be escaped.
trans-unit.target: [in] escapee napi_value ：napi_value表示要转义的JavaScript Object 。

trans-unit.source: [in] execute: The native function which should be called to execute the logic asynchronously. The given function is called from a worker pool thread and can execute in parallel with the main event loop thread.
trans-unit.target: [in] execute ：应调用本机函数以异步执行逻辑。给定的函数从工作池线程中调用，并且可以与主事件循环线程并行执行。

trans-unit.source: [in] external_data: Pointer to the underlying byte buffer of the ArrayBuffer.
trans-unit.target: [in] external_data ：指向 ArrayBuffer 的基础字节缓冲区的指针。

trans-unit.source: [in] finalize_cb: Native callback that will be used to free the native data when the JavaScript object is ready for garbage-collection.
trans-unit.target: [in] finalize_cb ：本机回调，当JavaScript对象准备好进行垃圾收集时，将用于释放本机数据。

trans-unit.source: [in] finalize_cb: Optional callback to call when the ArrayBuffer is being collected.
trans-unit.target: [in] finalize_cb ：收集 ArrayBuffer 时调用的可选回调。

trans-unit.source: [in] finalize_cb: Optional callback to call when the external value is being collected.
trans-unit.target: [in] finalize_cb ：收集外部值时调用的可选回调。

trans-unit.source: [in] finalize_cb: Optional native callback that can be used to free the native instance when the JavaScript object is ready for garbage-collection.
trans-unit.target: [in] finalize_cb ：可选的本机回调，可在JavaScript对象准备进行垃圾收集时释放本机实例。

trans-unit.source: [in] finalize_cb: The function to call when the environment is being torn down. The function receives data so that it might free it.
trans-unit.target: [in] finalize_cb ：当环境被拆除时要调用的函数。该函数接收 data 以便释放它。

trans-unit.source: [in] finalize_hint: Optional contextual hint that is passed to the finalize callback.
trans-unit.target: [in] finalize_hint ：传递到finalize回调的可选上下文提示。

trans-unit.source: [in] finalize_hint: Optional hint to pass to the finalize callback during collection.
trans-unit.target: [in] finalize_hint ：在收集期间传递给finalize回调的可选提示。

trans-unit.source: [in] func: napi_value representing the JavaScript function to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: [in] func ： napi_value 表示要调用的JavaScript函数。

trans-unit.source: [in] func: An optional JavaScript function to call from another thread. It must be provided if NULL is passed to call_js_cb.
trans-unit.target: [in] func ：从另一个线程调用的可选JavaScript函数。如果将 NULL 传递给 call_js_cb ，则必须提供它。

trans-unit.source: [in] func: The asynchronous thread-safe JavaScript function to invoke.
trans-unit.target: [in] func ：要调用的异步线程安全JavaScript函数。

trans-unit.source: [in] func: The asynchronous thread-safe JavaScript function to start making use of.
trans-unit.target: [in] func ：开始使用的异步线程安全JavaScript函数。

trans-unit.source: [in] func: The asynchronous thread-safe JavaScript function whose reference count to decrement.
trans-unit.target: [in] func ：异步线程安全的JavaScript函数，其引用计数递减。

trans-unit.source: [in] func: The thread-safe function for which to retrieve the context.
trans-unit.target: [in] func ：为其检索上下文的线程安全函数。

trans-unit.source: [in] func: The thread-safe function to reference.
trans-unit.target: [in] func ：要引用的线程安全函数。

trans-unit.source: [in] func: The thread-safe function to unreference.
trans-unit.target: [in] func ：取消引用的线程安全功能。

trans-unit.source: [in] index: The index of the property to delete.
trans-unit.target: [in] index ：要删除的属性的索引。

trans-unit.source: [in] index: The index of the property to get.
trans-unit.target: [in] index ：要获取的属性的索引。

trans-unit.source: [in] index: The index of the property to set.
trans-unit.target: [in] index ：要设置的属性的索引。

trans-unit.source: [in] index: The index of the property whose existence to check.
trans-unit.target: [in] index ：要检查其存在的属性的索引。

trans-unit.source: [in] initial_refcount: Initial reference count for the new reference.
trans-unit.target: [in] initial_refcount ：新引用的初始引用计数。

trans-unit.source: [in] initial_thread_count: The initial number of threads, including the main thread, which will be making use of this function.
trans-unit.target: [in] initial_thread_count ：将使用此功能的线程的初始数量，包括主线程。

trans-unit.source: [in] is_blocking: Flag whose value can be either napi_tsfn_blocking to indicate that the call should block if the queue is full or napi_tsfn_nonblocking to indicate that the call should return immediately with a status of napi_queue_full whenever the queue is full.
trans-unit.target: [in] is_blocking ：标志，其值可以是 napi_tsfn_blocking 以指示如果队列已满，或呼叫应该阻止 napi_tsfn_nonblocking 以指示呼叫应立即用的状态返回 napi_queue_full 每当队列已满。

trans-unit.source: [in] js_callback: The JavaScript function to call, or NULL if the thread-safe function is being torn down and data may need to be freed. It may also be NULL if the thread-safe function was created without js_callback.
trans-unit.target: [in] js_callback ：要调用的JavaScript函数；如果要删除线程安全函数并且可能需要释放 data 则为 NULL 。如果创建的线程安全函数没有 js_callback ,则它也可能为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: [in] js_object: The JavaScript object that will be the wrapper for the native object.
trans-unit.target: [in] js_object ：JavaScript对象，它将作为本机对象的包装。

trans-unit.source: [in] js_object: The JavaScript object to which the native data will be attached.
trans-unit.target: [in] js_object ：本机数据将附加到的JavaScript对象。

trans-unit.source: [in] js_object: The object associated with the native instance.
trans-unit.target: [in] js_object ：与本机实例关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: [in] key: The name of the own property whose existence to check.
trans-unit.target: [in] key ：要检查其存在的自有属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: [in] key: The name of the property to delete.
trans-unit.target: [in] key ：要删除的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: [in] key: The name of the property to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: [in] key ：要检索的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: [in] key: The name of the property to set.
trans-unit.target: [in] key ：要设置的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: [in] key: The name of the property whose existence to check.
trans-unit.target: [in] key ：要检查其存在的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: [in] length: Number of elements in the DataView.
trans-unit.target: [in] length ： DataView 中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: [in] length: Number of elements in the TypedArray.
trans-unit.target: [in] length ： TypedArray 中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: [in] length: Size in bytes of the input buffer (should be the same as the size of the new buffer).
trans-unit.target: [in] length ：输入缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）（应与新缓冲区的大小相同）。

trans-unit.source: [in] length: The initial length of the Array.
trans-unit.target: [in] length ： Array 的初始长度。

trans-unit.source: [in] length: The length in bytes of the array buffer to create.
trans-unit.target: [in] length ：要创建的数组缓冲区的长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: [in] length: The length of the utf8name in bytes, or NAPI_AUTO_LENGTH if it is null-terminated.
trans-unit.target: [in] length ： utf8name 的长度（以字节为单位），如果为null NAPI_AUTO_LENGTH 。

trans-unit.source: [in] length: The length of the string in bytes, or NAPI_AUTO_LENGTH if it is null-terminated.
trans-unit.target: [in] length ：字符串的长度（以字节为单位），如果为null NAPI_AUTO_LENGTH 。

trans-unit.source: [in] length: The length of the string in two-byte code units, or NAPI_AUTO_LENGTH if it is null-terminated.
trans-unit.target: [in] length ：以两个字节的代码为单位的字符串的长度；如果为空， NAPI_AUTO_LENGTH 。

trans-unit.source: [in] lhs: The JavaScript value to check.
trans-unit.target: [in] lhs ：要检查的JavaScript值。

trans-unit.source: [in] location: Optional location at which the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: [in] location ：发生错误的可选位置。

trans-unit.source: [in] location_len: The length of the location in bytes, or NAPI_AUTO_LENGTH if it is null-terminated.
trans-unit.target: [in] location_len ：位置的长度（以字节为单位），如果为null NAPI_AUTO_LENGTH 。

trans-unit.source: [in] max_queue_size: Maximum size of the queue. 0 for no limit.
trans-unit.target: [in] max_queue_size ：队列的最大大小。 0 （无限制）。

trans-unit.source: [in] message: The message associated with the error.
trans-unit.target: [in] message ：与错误相关的消息。

trans-unit.source: [in] message_len: The length of the message in bytes, or NAPI_AUTO_LENGTH if it is null-terminated.
trans-unit.target: [in] message_len ：消息的长度（以字节为单位），如果为null NAPI_AUTO_LENGTH 。

trans-unit.source: [in] mode: Flag whose value can be either napi_tsfn_release to indicate that the current thread will make no further calls to the thread-safe function, or napi_tsfn_abort to indicate that in addition to the current thread, no other thread should make any further calls to the thread-safe function. If set to napi_tsfn_abort, further calls to napi_call_threadsafe_function() will return napi_closing, and no further values will be placed in the queue.
trans-unit.target: [in] mode ：标记，其值可以是 napi_tsfn_release 以指示当前线程将不再对线程安全函数进行调用，或者可以是 napi_tsfn_abort 指示除当前线程之外，其他任何线程均不应进行任何进一步调用到线程安全功能。如果设置为 napi_tsfn_abort ，则对 napi_call_threadsafe_function() 的进一步调用将返回 napi_closing ，并且不会在队列中放置其他值。

trans-unit.source: [in] msg: napi_value that references a JavaScript String to be used as the message for the Error.
trans-unit.target: [in] msg ： napi_value ，它引用一个JavaScript String 用作 Error 的消息。

trans-unit.source: [in] msg: C string representing the text to be associated with the error.
trans-unit.target: [in] msg ：C字符串，表示要与错误关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: [in] native_object: The native data that will be attached to the JavaScript object.
trans-unit.target: [in] native_object ：将附加到JavaScript对象的本机数据。

trans-unit.source: [in] native_object: The native instance that will be wrapped in the JavaScript object.
trans-unit.target: [in] native_object ：将包装在JavaScript对象中的本机实例。

trans-unit.source: [in] object: napi_value representing JavaScript Object whose prototype to return. This returns the equivalent of Object.getPrototypeOf (which is not the same as the function's prototype property).
trans-unit.target: [in] object ： napi_value 表示要返回其原型的JavaScript Object 。这将返回 Object.getPrototypeOf 的等效项（与函数的 prototype 属性不同）。

trans-unit.source: [in] object: The JavaScript value to check.
trans-unit.target: [in] object ：要检查的JavaScript值。

trans-unit.source: [in] object: The object from which to retrieve the properties.
trans-unit.target: [in] object ：从中检索属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: [in] object: The object from which to retrieve the property.
trans-unit.target: [in] object ：从中检索属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: [in] object: The object from which to set the properties.
trans-unit.target: [in] object ：从中设置属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: [in] object: The object on which to set the property.
trans-unit.target: [in] object ：要在其上设置属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: [in] object: The object to query.
trans-unit.target: [in] object ：要查询的对象。

trans-unit.source: [in] promise: The promise to examine
trans-unit.target: [in] promise ：检查的承诺

trans-unit.source: [in] properties: Array of property descriptors describing static and instance data properties, accessors, and methods on the class See napi_property_descriptor.
trans-unit.target: [in] properties ：描述类的静态和实例数据属性，访问器和方法的属性描述符数组，请参见 napi_property_descriptor 。

trans-unit.source: [in] properties: The array of property descriptors.
trans-unit.target: [in] properties ：属性描述符的数组。

trans-unit.source: [in] property_count: Number of items in the properties array argument.
trans-unit.target: [in] property_count ： properties 数组参数中的项目数。

trans-unit.source: [in] property_count: The number of elements in the properties array.
trans-unit.target: [in] property_count ： properties 数组中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: [in] recv: The this object passed to the called function.
trans-unit.target: [in] recv ： this 对象传递给调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: [in] ref: napi_ref for which the reference count will be decremented.
trans-unit.target: [in] ref ： napi_ref ，其引用计数将减少。

trans-unit.source: [in] ref: napi_ref for which the reference count will be incremented.
trans-unit.target: [in] ref ： napi_ref ，其引用计数将增加。

trans-unit.source: [in] ref: napi_ref for which we requesting the corresponding Object.
trans-unit.target: [in] ref ：我们请求相应 Object 的 napi_ref 。

trans-unit.source: [in] ref: napi_ref to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: [in] ref ：要删除的 napi_ref 。

trans-unit.source: [in] rejection: The value with which to reject the promise.
trans-unit.target: [in] rejection ：用于拒绝承诺的值。

trans-unit.source: [in] resolution: The value with which to resolve the promise.
trans-unit.target: [in] resolution ：用于解决承诺的价值。

trans-unit.source: [in] resource_object: An object associated with the async work that will be passed to possible async_hooksinit hooks.
trans-unit.target: [in] resource_object ：与异步工作关联的对象，该对象将传递给可能的 async_hooks init 挂钩。

trans-unit.source: [in] rhs: The JavaScript value to check against.
trans-unit.target: [in] rhs ：要检查的JavaScript值。

trans-unit.source: [in] scope: napi_value representing the current scope.
trans-unit.target: [in] scope ：表示当前范围的 napi_value 。

trans-unit.source: [in] scope: napi_value representing the scope to be closed.
trans-unit.target: [in] scope ： napi_value 表示要关闭的范围。

trans-unit.source: [in] scope: The scope to be closed.
trans-unit.target: [in] scope ：要关闭的范围。

trans-unit.source: [in] script: A JavaScript string containing the script to execute.
trans-unit.target: [in] script ：包含要执行的脚本的JavaScript字符串。

trans-unit.source: [in] sign_bit: Determines if the resulting BigInt will be positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: [in] sign_bit ：确定生成的 BigInt 是正数还是负数。

trans-unit.source: [in] size: Size in bytes of the input buffer (should be the same as the size of the new buffer).
trans-unit.target: [in] size ：输入缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）（应与新缓冲区的大小相同）。

trans-unit.source: [in] size: Size in bytes of the underlying buffer.
trans-unit.target: [in] size ：基础缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: [in] str: Character buffer representing a UTF16-LE-encoded string.
trans-unit.target: [in] str ：字符缓冲区，表示UTF16-LE编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: [in] str: Character buffer representing a UTF8-encoded string.
trans-unit.target: [in] str ：字符缓冲区，表示UTF8编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: [in] str: Character buffer representing an ISO-8859-1-encoded string.
trans-unit.target: [in] str ：表示ISO-8859-1-编码字符串的字符缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: [in] thread_finalize_cb: Optional function to call when the napi_threadsafe_function is being destroyed.
trans-unit.target: [in] thread_finalize_cb ：销毁 napi_threadsafe_function 时调用的可选函数。

trans-unit.source: [in] thread_finalize_data: Optional data to be passed to thread_finalize_cb.
trans-unit.target: [in] thread_finalize_data ：传递给 thread_finalize_cb 的可选数据。

trans-unit.source: [in] time: ECMAScript time value in milliseconds since 01 January, 1970 UTC.
trans-unit.target: [in] time ：自1970年1月1日UTC以来的ECMAScript时间值（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: [in] type: Scalar datatype of the elements within the TypedArray.
trans-unit.target: [in] type ： TypedArray 中元素的标量数据类型。

trans-unit.source: [in] typedarray: napi_value representing the TypedArray whose properties to query.
trans-unit.target: [in] typedarray ： napi_value ,表示要查询其属性的 TypedArray 。

trans-unit.source: [in] utf8Name: The name of the function encoded as UTF8. This is visible within JavaScript as the new function object's name property.
trans-unit.target: [in] utf8Name ：编码为UTF8的函数的名称。这在JavaScript中作为新函数对象的 name 属性可见。

trans-unit.source: [in] utf8Name: The name of the property to get.
trans-unit.target: [in] utf8Name ：要获取的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: [in] utf8Name: The name of the property to set.
trans-unit.target: [in] utf8Name ：要设置的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: [in] utf8Name: The name of the property whose existence to check.
trans-unit.target: [in] utf8Name ：要检查其存在的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: [in] utf8name: Name of the JavaScript constructor function; this is not required to be the same as the C++ class name, though it is recommended for clarity.
trans-unit.target: [in] utf8name ：JavaScript构造函数的名称；尽管为了清楚起见，建议不要将此名称与C ++类名称相同。

trans-unit.source: [in] value: napi_value representing JavaScript BigInt.

The value for the data parameter has already been adjusted so that data points to the first element in the array. Therefore, the first byte of the native array would be at data - byte_offset.

trans-unit.source: birthtime "Birth Time" - Time of file creation. Set once when the file is created. On filesystems where birthtime is not available, this field may instead hold either the ctime or 1970-01-01T00:00Z (ie, Unix epoch timestamp 0). This value may be greater than atime or mtime in this case. On Darwin and other FreeBSD variants, also set if the atime is explicitly set to an earlier value than the current birthtime using the utimes(2) system call.
trans-unit.target: birthtime “出生时间”-文件创建的时间。创建文件后设置一次。在无法使用出生时间的文件系统上，该字段可以保存 ctime 或 1970-01-01T00:00Z （即Unix纪元时间戳 0 ）。在这种情况下，该值可能大于 atime 或 mtime 。在Darwin和其他FreeBSD变体上，如果使用 utimes(2) 系统调用将 atime 显式设置为比当前 birthtime 更早的值，则也要进行设置。

trans-unit.source: ca<string> | <string[]> | <Buffer> | <Buffer[]> Optionally override the trusted CA certificates. Default is to trust the well-known CAs curated by Mozilla. Mozilla's CAs are completely replaced when CAs are explicitly specified using this option. The value can be a string or Buffer, or an Array of strings and/or Buffers. Any string or Buffer can contain multiple PEM CAs concatenated together. The peer's certificate must be chainable to a CA trusted by the server for the connection to be authenticated. When using certificates that are not chainable to a well-known CA, the certificate's CA must be explicitly specified as a trusted or the connection will fail to authenticate. If the peer uses a certificate that doesn't match or chain to one of the default CAs, use the ca option to provide a CA certificate that the peer's certificate can match or chain to. For self-signed certificates, the certificate is its own CA, and must be provided. For PEM encoded certificates, supported types are "TRUSTED CERTIFICATE", "X509 CERTIFICATE", and "CERTIFICATE". See also tls.rootCertificates.
trans-unit.target: ca <字符串> | <string []> | <缓冲区> | <Buffer []>（可选）覆盖受信任的CA证书。默认设置是信任Mozilla策划的知名CA。使用此选项明确指定CA时，Mozilla的CA将被完全替换。该值可以是字符串或 Buffer ，也可以是字符串 Array 和/或 Buffer 。任何字符串或 Buffer 可以包含多个串联在一起的PEMCA。对等方的证书必须可链接到服务器信任的CA，以便对连接进行身份验证。当使用不可链接到知名CA的证书时，必须将证书的CA显式指定为受信任的证书，否则连接将无法通过身份验证。如果对等方使用与默认CA之一不匹配或不链接的证书，请使用 ca 选项提供对等方证书可以与之匹配或链接的CA证书。对于自签名证书，该证书是其自己的CA，必须提供。对于PEM编码的证书，支持的类型为“ TRUSTED CERTIFICATE”，“ X509 CERTIFICATE”和“ CERTIFICATE”。另请参见 tls.rootCertificates 。

trans-unit.target: cachedData <缓冲区> | <TypedArray> | <Da​​taView>为提供的源提供可选的 Buffer 或 TypedArray 或具有V8的代码缓存数据的 DataView 。

trans-unit.source: cert<string> | <string[]> | <Buffer> | <Buffer[]> Cert chains in PEM format. One cert chain should be provided per private key. Each cert chain should consist of the PEM formatted certificate for a provided private key, followed by the PEM formatted intermediate certificates (if any), in order, and not including the root CA (the root CA must be pre-known to the peer, see ca). When providing multiple cert chains, they do not have to be in the same order as their private keys in key. If the intermediate certificates are not provided, the peer will not be able to validate the certificate, and the handshake will fail.
trans-unit.target: cert <字符串> | <string []> | <缓冲区> | <Buffer []> PEM格式的证书链。每个私钥应提供一个证书链。每个证书链应包括一个提供私人的PEM格式的证书的 key ，接着PEM格式化中间证书（如果有的话），以便和不包括根CA（根CA必须预先已知的对等体，参见 ca ）。提供多个证书链时，它们的顺序不必与key中的 key 。如果未提供中间证书，则对等方将无法验证证书，并且握手将失败。

trans-unit.source: cert<Object> A certificate object representing the peer's certificate.
trans-unit.target: cert <对象>甲证书对象表示对等方的证书。

trans-unit.source: certfile: is a concatenation of all Certificate Authority (CA) certs into a single file, e.g. cat ca1-cert.pem ca2-cert.pem > ca-cert.pem
trans-unit.target: certfile ：将所有证书颁发机构（CA）证书合并为一个文件，例如 cat ca1-cert.pem ca2-cert.pem > ca-cert.pem

trans-unit.source: checkServerIdentity(servername, cert)<Function> A callback function to be used (instead of the builtin tls.checkServerIdentity() function) when checking the server's hostname (or the provided servername when explicitly set) against the certificate. This should return an <Error> if verification fails. The method should return undefined if the servername and cert are verified.
trans-unit.target: checkServerIdentity(servername, cert) <函数>中使用的回调函数（代替内置的 tls.checkServerIdentity() 检查服务器的主机名时功能）（或所提供的 servername 时显式地设置）与证书。如果验证失败，则应该返回<Error>。如果验证了 servername 和 cert 则该方法应返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: chunk can be a string or a buffer. If chunk is a string, the second parameter specifies how to encode it into a byte stream. callback will be called when this chunk of data is flushed.
trans-unit.target: chunk 可以是字符串或缓冲区。如果 chunk 是字符串，则第二个参数指定如何将其编码为字节流。刷新此数据块时将调用 callback 。

trans-unit.source: chunk can be a string or a buffer. If chunk is a string, the second parameter specifies how to encode it into a byte stream. By default the encoding is 'utf8'. callback will be called when this chunk of data is flushed.
trans-unit.target: chunk 可以是字符串或缓冲区。如果 chunk 是字符串，则第二个参数指定如何将其编码为字节流。默认情况下， encoding 为 'utf8' 。刷新此数据块时将调用 callback 。

trans-unit.source: chunk<Buffer> | <string> | <any> The Buffer to be transformed, converted from the string passed to stream.write(). If the stream's decodeStrings option is false or the stream is operating in object mode, the chunk will not be converted & will be whatever was passed to stream.write().
trans-unit.target: chunk <Buffer> | <string> | <any>要转换的 Buffer ，从传递给 stream.write() 的 string 转换而来。如果流的 decodeStrings 选项为 false 或流在对象模式下运行，则该块将不进行转换，并且将传递给 stream.write() 。

trans-unit.source: chunk<Buffer> | <string> | <any> The Buffer to be written, converted from the string passed to stream.write(). If the stream's decodeStrings option is false or the stream is operating in object mode, the chunk will not be converted & will be whatever was passed to stream.write().
trans-unit.target: chunk <Buffer> | <string> | <any>要写入的 Buffer ，从传递给 stream.write() 的 string 转换而来。如果流的 decodeStrings 选项为 false 或流在对象模式下运行，则该块将不进行转换，并且将成为传递给 stream.write() 的任何东西。

trans-unit.source: chunk<Buffer> | <string> | <any> The chunk of data. For streams that are not operating in object mode, the chunk will be either a string or Buffer. For streams that are in object mode, the chunk can be any JavaScript value other than null.
trans-unit.target: chunk <Buffer> | <string> | <any>数据块。对于不在对象模式下运行的流，块将是字符串或 Buffer 。对于处于对象模式的流，该块可以是 null 以外的任何JavaScript值。

trans-unit.source: chunk<Buffer> | <Uint8Array> | <string> | <null> | <any> Chunk of data to push into the read queue. For streams not operating in object mode, chunk must be a string, Buffer or Uint8Array. For object mode streams, chunk may be any JavaScript value.
trans-unit.target: chunk <Buffer> | <Uint8Array> | <string> | <null> | <any>大块数据，以推送到读取队列中。对于不在对象模式下运行的流， chunk 必须是字符串 Buffer 或 Uint8Array 。对于对象模式流， chunk 可以是任何JavaScript值。

trans-unit.source: chunk<Buffer> | <Uint8Array> | <string> | <null> | <any> Chunk of data to unshift onto the read queue. For streams not operating in object mode, chunk must be a string, Buffer, Uint8Array or null. For object mode streams, chunk may be any JavaScript value.
trans-unit.target: chunk <Buffer> | <Uint8Array> | <string> | <null> | <any>要分块的数据以移入读取队列。对于不以对象模式运行的流， chunk 必须为字符串， Buffer ， Uint8Array 或 null 。对于对象模式流， chunk 可以是任何JavaScript值。

trans-unit.source: chunk<string> | <Buffer>
trans-unit.target: chunk <string> | <缓冲区>

trans-unit.source: chunk<string> | <Buffer> | <Uint8Array> | <any> Optional data to write. For streams not operating in object mode, chunk must be a string, Buffer or Uint8Array. For object mode streams, chunk may be any JavaScript value other than null.
trans-unit.target: chunk <string> | <缓冲区> | <Uint8Array> | <any>要写入的可选数据。对于不在对象模式下运行的流， chunk 必须是字符串 Buffer 或 Uint8Array 。对于对象模式流， chunk 可以是 null 以外的任何JavaScript值。

trans-unit.source: colorMode<boolean> | <string> Set color support for this Console instance. Setting to true enables coloring while inspecting values, setting to 'auto' will make color support depend on the value of the isTTY property and the value returned by getColorDepth() on the respective stream. This option can not be used, if inspectOptions.colors is set as well. Default:'auto'.

trans-unit.source: compact<boolean> | <integer> Setting this to false causes each object key to be displayed on a new line. It will also add new lines to text that is longer than breakLength. If set to a number, the most n inner elements are united on a single line as long as all properties fit into breakLength. Short array elements are also grouped together. No text will be reduced below 16 characters, no matter the breakLength size. For more information, see the example below. Default:3.
trans-unit.target: compact <boolean> | <integer>将此设置为 false 会使每个对象键显示在新行上。还将在文本中添加比 breakLength 长的新行。如果设置为数字，则只要所有属性都适合 breakLength ，则最多 n 个内部元素会合并在一行上。短数组元素也被分组在一起。无论 breakLength 大小如何，文本都不会减少到16个字符以下。有关更多信息，请参见下面的示例。默认值： 3 。
